title: Tsumetaku, Amai
description:
A series of one shots about couples' struggles and happiness. The subtlety and tensions of the stories are all aided by Shigisawa's delicately realistic style.

1) Cool and sweet
2) Happiness or Unhappiness
3) A woman with glasses' agonizing pain
4) Cheap Sweets
5) Meeting up at the end of the world
6) The person to keep
7) A secret word
8) Let's meet when it's time to give up
9) Storm Hill
10) If only you never existed
11) 8PM: offense and defense
12) A little bit bothered
